characterDescription: Sixteen is a Scadrian Worldhopper living in Lasting Integrity in Shadesmar.

characterDetails.Appearance:
Although he appears to be Shin, (due to the lack of epicanthic folds on his eyes), he is, in fact, human.
His back is hunched and and he wears a hooded robe to hide that appearance.
characterDetails.Characteristics: Sixteen lives near the statue gardens in Lasting Integrity in a small box. He leaves that home every sixteen days, which is a practice that amuses the honorspren there due to his consistency. He doesn't bring any food or water there, but neither does he bring any waste there.
characterDetails.Notes: He likely subsists by some means of Investiture.
